comment: If they loved their country they would stay and fix it. But it is about "free stuff", we all know that. Same for the masses swarming Europe the past few years. Like moths to a flame, if you dangle free stuff in their face the deadbeats will come. Cut all social services to all but citizens and watch them turn around.
amr:
# ::snt If they loved their country they would stay and fix it. But it is about "free stuff", we all know that. Same for the masses swarming Europe the past few years. Like moths to a flame, if you dangle free stuff in their face the deadbeats will come. Cut all social services to all but citizens and watch them turn around.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / stay-01
                  :ARG1 (t / they))
            :op2 (f / fix-02
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :poss t))
            :condition (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 c))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (c3 / concern-02
                  :ARG0 (ii / it)
                  :ARG1 (s2 / stuff
                        :ARG1-of (f2 / free-04)))
            :ARG1-of (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we
                        :mod (a2 / all))))
      :snt3 (s3 / same-01
            :ARG2 (s4 / swarm-01
                  :ARG0 (m2 / mass)
                  :ARG1 (c4 / continent
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Europe"))
                  :time (b / before
                        :op1 (n2 / now)
                        :duration (f3 / few
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (y / year))))))
      :snt4 (c5 / come-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (d / die-01)
                  :part (f4 / face))
            :condition (d2 / dangle-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (s5 / stuff
                        :ARG1-of (f5 / free-04))
                  :ARG2 f4))
      :snt5 (a3 / and
            :op1 (c6 / cut-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (s6 / service
                        :mod (s7 / social)
                        :mod (a4 / all)
                        :ARG2-of (e / except-01
                              :ARG1 (c7 / citizen))))
            :op2 (w2 / watch-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (t3 / turn-01
                        :ARG1 c7
                        :direction (a5 / around)))))
